purpose: To automate the recommendation of new arXiv papers that align with a user's research interests as reflected in their Zotero library.
principle: Integrates with Zotero to analyze a user's library and uses this data to filter and recommend relevant new arXiv papers.
reusability: Can be set up as a GitHub Action, allowing for easy integration into workflows that involve Zotero and arXiv.
limitations: Recommendations are limited to the scope of arXiv and depend on the accuracy of the user's Zotero library metadata.
name: zotero-arxiv-daily
description: Recommend new arxiv papers of your interest daily according to your Zotero libarary.
highlight: Daily recommendations of new arXiv papers tailored to users' interests based on their Zotero library.
